pageContext.claim: “We've removed 20,000 gang members, including 4,500 MS-13 members, and we brought them back to their countries.”
pageContext.analysis: Just a month earlier, at a July 15 news conference, Trump had proclaimed: "In the last three years, ICE has deported over 16,000 gang members and arrested over 2,000 members of MS-13. Think of those numbers: 16,000 and arrested over 2,000 members of MS-13." Funny how much bigger the numbers became in just one month. In fact, U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) reported deporting fewer gang members in fiscal year 2020 than in the first three years of Trump's administration.
